trans-unit.source: A class that enables you to associate easing functions with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> key frame animation.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que permite que você associe atenuação funciona com um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> chave quadro de animação.

trans-unit.source: For an example of using an object similar to this one, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo do uso de um objeto semelhante a esse, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada como parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrameCollection>em conjunto com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames>para animar uma <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>valor da propriedade ao longo de um conjunto de quadros-chave.</xref:System.Windows.Thickness> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame> interpolates between the <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> value of the previous key frame and its own value linearly with an easing function to produce its output value.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame>interpola entre o <xref:System.Windows.Thickness>valor de quadro chave anterior e seu próprio valor linearmente com uma função de atenuação para produzir o valor de saída.</xref:System.Windows.Thickness> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicial <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> value and key time.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> valor e chave de tempo.

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicial <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: A hora inicial de chave.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> value, key time, and easing function.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> valor, a chave de tempo e facilitando a função.

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicial <xref href="System.Windows.Thickness"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: A hora inicial de chave.

trans-unit.source: The easing function.
trans-unit.target: A função de easing.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: Ao criar uma classe derivada, você deve substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: Classes de animação herdam indiretamente <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, você precisa substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>método para construir um objeto de animação personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a função de easing aplicada ao quadro chave.

trans-unit.source: The easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: A função de atenuação aplicada ao quadro chave.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame.EasingFunction*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame.EasingFunction*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingThicknessKeyFrame.EasingFunction*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, according to the easing function used, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: Interpola, acordo com a função de easing usada entre o valor anterior de quadro-chave e o valor do quadro atual da chave, usando o incremento de andamento fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: O valor para animar do.

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0,0 e 1,0, inclusive, que especifica a porcentagem de tempo decorrido para este quadro-chave.

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: O valor de saída de quadro chave recebe o valor de base especificado e o andamento.
